model_path = (MODELS_PATH / trait_name /
    f'{trait_name}.{classifier_type.lower()}.pkl')
genotype_file = FLAT_PATH / trait_name / f'{trait_name}.genotype'
print(predict(classifier=model_path, genotype=genotype_file))
pytest.mark.parametrize('trait_name', trait_names, ids=trait_names)pytest.mark.parametrize('classifier_type', classifier_ids, ids=classifier_ids)
